title: Snape grass plant

properties.value: Snape grass plants are a Farming plant grown at level 61 Farming. Snape grass plants are grown by planting 3 snape grass seeds in an allotment patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 5 jangerberries and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Snape grass plants are a Farming plant grown at level 61 Farming. Snape grass plants are grown by planting 3 snape grass seeds in an allotment patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 5 jangerberries and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the snape grass seeds gives 82 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the allotment, then disease in the allotment may be removed using Plant cure, or using the Cure plant spell in the Lunar spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of Lunar Diplomacy. If left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each snape grass, when picked, gives 82 farming experience. Once all snape grass has been picked, the allotment will be clear for new crops.

The Amulet of bounty is useful for saving snape grass seeds, meaning a saving of 4,750.4 coins per charge.

'''Snape grass plants''' are a [[Farming]] plant grown at level 61 Farming. Snape grass plants are grown by planting 3 [[snape grass seeds]] in an [[allotment patch]] using a [[seed dibber]]. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 5 [[jangerberries]] and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the snape grass seeds gives 82 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the allotment, then disease in the allotment may be removed using [[Plant cure]], or using the [[Cure plant]] spell in the [[Lunar]] spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of [[Lunar Diplomacy]]. If left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each snape grass, when picked, gives 82 farming experience. Once all snape grass has been picked, the allotment will be clear for new crops.

The [[Amulet of bounty]] is useful for saving snape grass seeds, meaning a saving of 4,750.4 coins per charge.
